pillars.label: Resources
pillars.note: France Development Law target: 75% of bilateral ODA DAC 1/2 by 2025; 20% principal (DAC 2)

pillars.label: Institutional Depth
pillars.note: France now mandates embedded FFP, WPS NAP, and partial gender-budget tagging with ongoing increase in focal coverage.

pillars.label: Norm-setting
pillars.note: France sustained GEF co-hosting, led G7 gender (2019), and co-led 3+ norm-setting coalitions in past 3 years.
